placeholderImages.description: A diagram showing git config setting user name and email.
A diagram showing an empty folder being turned into a Git repository with the git init command.
A diagram showing a remote repository being copied to a local machine with git clone.
A diagram showing files moving from the working directory to the staging area using git add.
A diagram showing files from the staging area being saved into the repository as a commit.
A diagram illustrating the output of git status, showing modified, staged, and untracked files.
A diagram showing the creation of a new branch from the main branch.
A diagram showing HEAD moving from one commit to another after a git checkout.
A diagram illustrating how a feature branch is merged into the main branch, combining their histories.
A diagram showing commits from a feature branch being moved to the tip of the main branch.
A diagram showing a local repository with connections to origin and upstream remote repositories.
A diagram showing new commits being downloaded from a remote repository to the local machine, but not yet integrated.
A diagram showing git fetch and git merge happening in one git pull command.
A diagram showing local commits being uploaded to a remote repository.
An illustration of the output of git log, showing a list of commits with hashes, authors, and messages.
An illustration showing the textual differences between two files, with lines added and removed.
A diagram showing the HEAD pointer moving back to a previous commit, with options for soft, mixed, and hard resets.
A diagram showing a new commit being created that undoes the changes from a previous commit.
A diagram showing changes from the working directory being saved to a stash, and then being reapplied later.
A diagram showing a 'v1.0' tag pointing to a specific commit in the project history.
A diagram showing a single commit from one branch being copied and applied to another branch.
